title: Value Engineer a Project
description: After bidding, construction costs for a new project come in over budget. The developer must work with the architect and contractor to 'value engineer' the project to reduce costs.

tasks.description: Analyze the construction bids to identify the most expensive line items.
tasks.expected_outcome: The main drivers of the cost overrun are identified.

tasks.description: Hold a meeting with the architect and contractor to brainstorm potential cost-saving changes, such as substituting materials or modifying non-essential design elements.
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of potential cost-saving ideas is generated.

tasks.description: Revise the project plans and specifications based on the agreed-upon changes and obtain a new price from the contractor.
tasks.expected_outcome: The project budget is successfully reduced to an acceptable level.
